com.amwe.bokbytarapp.ControllerView.MessagePage

Class ChatRoomAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold>
      • com.amwe.bokbytarapp.ControllerView.MessagePage.ChatRoomAdapter

  • public class ChatRoomAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold>
    Author:
    Elias Johansson

    Responsibility:This class is an adapter that will show recent messages by Author in the RecyclerView. It uses a List to hold all the conversations that pertains to the current user. It will then look through that list for the most recent message in a conversation and show it. Used by: ChatRoomsPage, DatabaseSubject. Uses: MessageViewHold,Database,IMessage,IMessage,IMessageFactory,PrivateKey.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold
      Class that holds all the information about a specific conversation and that is populating the RecyclerView.

      • getItemCount

        public int getItemCount()
        Specified by:
        getItemCount in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold>
        Returns:
        the size of the list that holds all chat rooms that pertains to the current user. It is used by background Android functionality to get the current index of the list.

      • onBindViewHolder

        public void onBindViewHolder(@NonNull
                             ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold holder,
                             int position)
        This method looks at the messages in a conversation and sends the latest with all information to the MessageViewHold.
        Specified by:
        onBindViewHolder in class androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold>
        Parameters:
        holder - the object that will hold all the information about a conversation and then show it.
        position - an index to access the current DataSnapshot in itemList.

public ChatRoomAdapter.MessageViewHold onCreateViewHolder(@NonNull
                                                                   android.view.ViewGroup parent,

        This method creates a new MessageViewHold that will then be populated in onBindViewHolder.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        viewType - not used but needed if there are conditions for different types of views. Needed because of override.
